claims.claim: 37% lift in repeat purchases from AI-driven personalization
claims.quote: Across various reports, Starbucks shows a repeat purchase lift of around 37% related to AI-driven personalization.

claims.claim: 30% higher marketing ROI from more relevant offers and better audience segmentation
claims.quote: Up to 30% higher marketing ROI thanks to more relevant offers and better audience segmentation

claims.claim: Improved customer engagement on the app
claims.quote: Improved customer engagement on the app has become noticeable.

claims.claim: Reduced waste and more accurate planning at store level
claims.quote: Reduced waste and more accurate planning at store level

claims.claim: Record quarterly earnings achieved through AI and digital innovation
claims.quote: The strategic emphasis on AI and digital innovation has yielded notable results for Starbucks, including record quarterly earnings and a substantial increase in active rewards program members.

claims.claim: Substantial increase in active rewards program members
claims.quote: The strategic emphasis on AI and digital innovation has yielded notable results for Starbucks, including record quarterly earnings and a substantial increase in active rewards program members.

claims.claim: 15% growth in US rewards membership to 17.6 million members
claims.quote: The result has seen a 15% growth in US membership to 17.6 million members in the last quarter of 2019, up 15% year-over-year.

claims.claim: Digital orders made up 10% of business in China with 7% from delivery and 3% from Mobile Order & Pay
claims.quote: In China, digital orders made up 10% of the company's business this past quarter, with 7% coming from delivery and 3% from Mobile Order & Pay, Starbucks' app-based order-ahead feature.

claims.claim: 34.3 million rewards members in the U.S. by 2023
claims.quote: By 2023, the company counted 34.3 million rewards members in the U.S. alone.

claims.claim: AI inventory system reduces time from one hour to fifteen minutes
claims.quote: What once took staff an hour with paper and pencil now takes about fifteen minutes with a tablet scan.
